name: cubehelix
description: An implementation of Dave Green's cubehelix algorithm to translate values in the [0, 1] range to monotonically increasing RGB colors

build-watch.README.ENOSPC: If the above command gives you 'Error: watch src/lib.js ENOSPC', you have to do the following:
$ echo fs.inotify.max_user_watches=524288 | sudo tee -a /etc/sysctl.conf && sudo sysctl -p
... as suggested in the below links:
scripts.preglobalInstallOnThisMachine: npm run clean && npm run test
scripts.prepublish: (in-publish && npm run clean && npm run build && npm run test && npm run linter && /bin/true) || not-in-publish
scripts.prepublish.README: to enable publishing, remove the /bin/false at the end (this serves as a publish guard), or replace with /bin/true
